games.name: Days Gone

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review: I think it would be better if it was a 2D platformer about a bug, maybe something like Hollow Knight

games.about: Ride and fight into a deadly, post pandemic America. Play as Deacon St. John, a drifter and bounty hunter who rides the broken road, fighting to survive while searching for a reason to live in this open-world action-adventure game.

games.name: It Takes Two

reviews.name: Woody & Buzz
reviews.review: What's so special about this game? ðŸ‘Ž

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review: Cool game but not as good as Hollow Knight

games.about: Embark on the craziest journey of your life in It Takes Two. Invite a friend to join for free with Friendâ€™s Pass and work together across a huge variety of gleefully disruptive gameplay challenges.

games.name: The Elder Scrolls Online

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review: Almost as good as Hollow Knight

games.about: Join over 18 million players in the award-winning online multiplayer RPG and experience limitless adventure in a persistent Elder Scrolls world. Battle, craft, steal, or explore, and combine different types of equipment and abilities to create your own style of play. No game subscription required.

games.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review: I was called various slurs in my first game with other people

games.about: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago. CS: GO features new maps, characters, weapons, and game modes, and delivers updated versions of the classic CS content (de_dust2, etc.).

games.name: Terraria

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review: I like that it's 2D, but there should have been a linear story like another 2D game I like

games.about: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

games.name: Senren * Banka

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review:
Do you think God stays in heaven because he too lives in fear of what he's created? 
-Steve Buscemi, Spy Kids 2 (2002)

games.about: Senrenï¼ŠBanka is a Japanese-style visual novel produced by Yuzusoft, a Japanese developer of romance VNs. This game commemorated Yuzusoft's 10th anniversary. It won numerous awards on the year of its release in Japan for its art, music, and characters.

games.name: Portal 2

reviews.name: Timmy
reviews.review: REALLY good game, just wish it featured a knight of some kind, maybe a hollow one.

games.about: The 'Perpetual Testing Initiative' has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

games.name: Hollow Knight
games.about: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes. Explore twisting caverns, battle tainted creatures and befriend bizarre bugs, all in a classic, hand-drawn 2D style.
